{{Talk:SMS Gefion/GA1}}
== [[:File:S.M. kleiner kreuzer Gefion - restoration, borderless.jpg]] to appear as POTD soon == Hello! This is a note to let the editors of this article know that [[:File:S.M. kleiner kreuzer Gefion - restoration, borderless.jpg]] will be appearing as [[Wikipedia:picture of the day|picture of the day]] on November 30, 2015. You can view and edit the POTD blurb at [[Template:POTD/2015-11-30]]. If this article needs any attention or maintenance, it would be preferable if that could be done before its appearance on the [[Main Page]]. — [[User:Crisco 1492|Chris Woodrich]] ([[User talk:Crisco 1492|talk]]) 23:37, 12 November 2015 (UTC) {{POTD/2015-11-30}}
== Photo ==
[http://www.history.navy.mil/our-collections/photography/numerical-list-of-images/nhhc-series/nh-series/NH-88000/NH-88634.html here]. [[User:Parsecboy|Parsecboy]] ([[User talk:Parsecboy|talk]]) 16:41, 7 January 2016 (UTC)
:And [http://www.history.navy.mil/our-collections/photography/numerical-list-of-images/nhhc-series/nh-series/NH-88000/NH-88636.html here]. [[User:Parsecboy|Parsecboy]] ([[User talk:Parsecboy|talk]]) 16:47, 7 January 2016 (UTC)
== Korvettenkapitän Waldeyer ==
According the german "Ehrenrangliste der Kaiserliche Marine" from 1930 a german Korvettenkapitän Waldeyer is not listetd. I think, its a mistake and a confusion with the later Fregattenkapitän Hugo von Waldayer-Hartz. MfG [[User:URTh|URTh]] ([[User talk:URTh|talk]]) 10:42, 13 May 2016 (UTC) :No, it's one and the same person. [[Heinrich Wilhelm Gottfried von Waldeyer-Hartz|Waldeyer's father]] was elevated to hereditary nobility in 1916, thus the change in name. [[User:ÄDA - DÄP|ÄDA - DÄP VA]] ([[User talk:ÄDA - DÄP|talk]]) 18:23, 13 May 2016 (UTC)
